<title level="1" right="Action">[Call Companion](/Actions.aspx?ID=601) <actions string="" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Exploration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=66" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 160 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You spend 1 minute calling for a different animal companion, switching your active companion for another of your animal companions.
name: Call Companion
